channel.title: currentFace?

item.title: currentFace?
item.dc:creator: @mariuswb mariuswb
item.description:
@mariuswb wrote:

Is there possible to make a void which keep the same int Face?

Like this

public void ReplaceObjects(int objectX, int objectY, int NewObjectID) { outStream.createFrameVarSizeWord(60); outStream.writeByte(objectY - (mapRegionY * 8)); outStream.writeByteC(objectX - (mapRegionX * 8)); /*DELETE OBJECT*/ outStream.writeByte(101); outStream.writeByteC(0); outStream.writeByte(0); /*CREATE OBJECT*/ if (NewObjectID > -1) { outStream.writeByte(151); outStream.writeByteS(0); outStream.writeWordBigEndian(NewObjectID); } outStream.endFrameVarSizeWord(); }

No leechers please, that saying “oh, thats wierd. sorry i dont know”

Read full topic
